articles.title: House Speaker Johnson joins growing number of Republicans pressing Trump administration for more transparency on Epstein case
articles.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson has called for increased transparency from the Trump administration regarding the Jeffrey Epstein case, aligning with other Republicans seeking more details from the investigation.

articles.title: Pentagon Signs $200 Million Deal with Elon Musk’s xAI for Federal Use of Grok
articles.description: The Pentagon has entered into a $200 million contract with Elon Musk’s AI company xAI to deploy its chatbot Grok across federal agencies, local governments, and national security operations.

articles.title: Trump Administration Cancels Protected Status for Honduran and Nicaraguan Immigrants
articles.description: The Trump administration announced the termination of deportation protections for approximately 76,000 immigrants from Honduras and Nicaragua, many of whom have been residing in the U.S. since 1999.
